title: ziggs tower destroying is OP
body: not so much his passive but the hexwhatever tacked onto his w is utter bullshitly op.

replies.body:
How dare he fill a niche.
He may be strong in tower pushing, but he's lacking in other areas.  His harass is easy to dodge (unless at the first bounce area), his mobility is quite limited, and his hard cc comes at the cost of losing that small amount of mobility.
